title: A VISTA data package.
text: ‚ú® Features ‚ú® Offers vista_dm, public version VISTA relational data model R, leveraging {dm} package. üöß (coming soon) Converts VISTA 1% ABS Census Sample File CVISTA (C stands close-enough-), intermediate format. ‚òùÔ∏è versions VISTA, can use vista_to_dm() function convert VISTA tables {dm} object.

title: A VISTA data package.
text: can install released version vista GitHub :

title: A VISTA data package.
code: library(vista) vista18 <- get_vista18() vista18_dm <- vista_to_dm(   persons = vista18$persons,   households = vista18$households,   trips = vista18$trips,   stops = vista18$stops,   jte = vista18$jte,   jtw = vista18$jtw ) library(dm) vista18_dm %>%   dm_draw()

what: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
title: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
text: function turn tables VISTA relational data model, dm::dm() object.

title: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
code: vista_to_dm(persons, households, trips, stops, jte, jtw)

title: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
text: dm::dm() object containing 6 tables: persons Person-level data - ID columns: persid(PK), hhid. households Household-level data - ID columns: hhid(PK). trips Trips - ID columns: tripid(PK), persid, hhid. stops Trips' stops - ID columns: persid(PK), hhid. jtw journey work - ID columns: jtwid(PK), persid, hhid. jte journey education - ID columns: jtwid(PK), persid, hhid.

title: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
text: persons 'persons' table VISTA. households 'households' table VISTA. trips 'trips' table VISTA. stops 'stops' table VISTA. jte 'jte' table VISTA. jtw 'jtw' table VISTA.

title: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
text: dm::dm() object containing six tables keys link .

title: Convert VISTA tables to a dm object. ‚Äî vista_to_dm
code: vista18 <- get_vista18() #> Warning: error 1 in extracting from zip file #> Error in if (grepl(".csv$", path)) {    return(read.csv(path))}: argument is of length zero vista18_dm <- vista_to_dm(   persons = vista18$persons,    households = vista18$households,    trips = vista18$trips,    stops = vista18$stops,    jte = vista18$jte,    jtw = vista18$jtw   ) #> Error in isTRUE(lhs): object 'vista18' not found

title: vista 0.0.2
text: Remove vista data package. Users now need call get_vista18() manually convert output dm using vista_to_dm(). See example README.

title: vista 0.0.1
text: Added vista_dm, relational data model VISTA 2012-2018 public version.
